subject: Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The runner Rashi Ramzi of Bahrain, the gold medalist in the 1,500-meters, and the cyclist Davide Rebellin of Italy, the silver medalist in the road race, are two of six athletes who failed tests.
snippet: The runner Rashi Ramzi of Bahrain, the gold medalist in the 1,500-meters, and the cyclist Davide Rebellin of Italy, the silver medalist in the road race, are two of six athletes who failed tests.
